snippet: President Obama offered a new candidate for House speaker on Saturday after the fight for the post devolved into a chaotic scramble this week on Capitol Hill. Mr. Obama’s candidate? Rap star Kanye West.
abstract: President Obama offered a new candidate for House speaker on Saturday after the fight for the post devolved into a chaotic scramble this week on Capitol Hill. Mr. Obama’s candidate? Rap star Kanye West.

headline.main: Obama Jokes About Kanye West at San Francisco Fund-Raiser
